programme.title: The Microsoft monopoly actions
programme.short_synopsis: Microsoft faces legal challenenges to its alleged Internet Explorer web browser monopoly.
programme.medium_synopsis: Bill Gates' Microsoft faces a barrage of legal actions claiming that the Explorer web browser is a monopoly and Alistair Cooke considers the history of US anti-monopoly law.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
